alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; Scott; Stoddard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 12:17PM CDT until July 18 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Union County in southern Illinois... Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Johnson County in southern Illinois... Southern Williamson County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Jackson County in southern Illinois... Alexander County in southern Illinois... Ballard County in western Kentucky... Northern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Eastern Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1217 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Murphysboro to near Scott City to near Essex, moving east, southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Marion, Sikeston, Charleston, Anna, Cairo, Jonesboro, Vienna, La Center, Miner, Wickliffe, Cobden, Goreville, Bertrand, Mounds, Dongola, Barlow, Tamms, Mound City and Creal Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
